description:
<p><strong>We are looking to recruit </strong><br />  <br />  A salaried GP with view to partnership (full or part time) for 6-8 sessions per week.<br />  <br />  We are expanding our team and looking for a flexible, enthusiastic salaried GP to join us. Our surgery is based in Wrexham, North Wales in a busy town situated in an enviable location with the beautiful scenery of Snowdonia and the North Wales coast nearby but also close to Chester, Liverpool & Manchester.<br />  <br />  Have a look at the attached job advert for more information.</p>
<p> </p>

hiringOrganization.name: GP Practices - Betsi Cadwaladr University Health Board

title: General Practitioner (Salaried)
